subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Wayne Simmonds scored two goals after he was hit in the face in warm-ups and Max Talbot also scored twice, leading the host Philadelphia Flyers to a 7-2 victory over the Buffalo Sabres.
snippet: Wayne Simmonds scored two goals after he was hit in the face in warm-ups and Max Talbot also scored twice, leading the host Philadelphia Flyers to a 7-2 victory over the Buffalo Sabres.
